item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

if your using delta, search in client.java for
setsidebarinterface

there should be a group of setsidebarinterface ranging from the attack interface to the music interface

an example would be
SetSidebarInterface(#, @@@@);

- the sidebar id, (inventory, spellbook, etc)

@@@@ - the interface id

just experiment with the intefaces you see in there and you should come across the inventory one, just change tha interface id with the new 1

Read full topic

you have to set the inventory sidebar to the new interface server sided.

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

why do you have alot of spaces in cool inv? thats what gives you errors

make Cool Inv into CoolInv

Class9 intCool Inv[/code] needs to be [code] Class9 int CoolInv

and where you have all those intCoolInv.anInt-----
need to be CoolInv.anInt-----

(i used ----- as a reference to the whole of the code, so dont put those dashes in your code)
P.S: it still looks like there is a space in CoolInv, but there isnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Hey,
i recently used an interface maker to make a new interface haha. (the right part where there is the skills, emotes, friends, cc etc…)
and i got the codes and added it to the very bottom of my class9.java
i compiled and got a ton of errors.
then i added another code under aclass44 = aclass44 and got one more error
here are the codes

[code]aClass44 = aClass44;
wave(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
Cool Inv(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
newwelcome(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
KSWelcome(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
teleports2(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
teleports1(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
AAInterface(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
pestreward(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
EquipmentTab(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
EquipmentScreen(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
ClanChat(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);//buttons
ClanChatscroll();//scrollbar overlay(main interface)
ClanChatBox(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
//(The Box, has to be in seperate interface to move with scroll bar)
itemsOnDeathDATA(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
itemsOnDeath(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
multiicon();
harrysoptiontab(class44_1, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
EmoteTab();
EmoteTab3();
getClanChat(class44_1, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
getLunar(class44_1, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
getPrayer(class44_1, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
Welcome();

    aClass12_238 = null;
    if(byte0 != -84);
}[/code]

the third one is the one i used (cool inv)

and this is the big code i put in

[code] }
}

public Class9()
{
    anInt213 = 9;
    anInt229 = 891;
}
